name: Talking Funny Bunny
description:
★ ★ ★ Discover, for FREE, this fun, athletic bunny who needs you to keep him in shape every day, so he doesn’t lose his fitness level. You will have to feed him healthy food and go to the gym... Ahhhh! To do this you need to give him apples, juice, and carrots... and be careful not to eat a lot of hamburgers! ★ ★ ★

★ ★ ★ With the Talking Funny Bunny you can now talk, play, and interact! ★ ★ ★
Discover his amusing reactions, and so much more, when you poke him in different physical conditions. And as a final surprise, this bunny wants you to learn his dance steps, and move to the rhythm and the animated songs.

★ ★ ★WHAT CAN YOU DO WITH TALKING FUNNY BUNNY ★ ★ ★
-He always listens to you and repeats what you say.
-Monitor his physical condition to stay in shape.
-Go to the gym and work out with 3 super-games.
-Earn apples in each game and use them as you want.
-Discover how to move on the dance floor with his favorite songs.
-Enjoy his funny images, animations, dances, and music.
-Send photos to your friends from his album

TALKING FUNNY BUNNY is the funniest character in the My Talking Toys collection, and you can find amazing mini-games and dances to stay entertained.

Share it with your friends!
Website: www.mytalkingtoys.com
Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hZERqTtO7_I
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/My.Talking.Toys.Collection

★★★ IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS ★★★
Your iPod Touch, iPhone, or iPad must have a microphone or headphones with an attached microphone. Otherwise, the voice-recording features will not work.
